title: Windows 7 ENTERPRISE x64 SP1 Lite (updates to 1/3/2016)
description:
Windows 7 Lite Version


This windows is a worthy succerssor of previous my first win7 Lite upload which was deleted by DMCA, it installs on both desktops and laptops TESTED,optimised to use very little CPU and RAM resources.
This version is ideal for gamers and basic pc users with a low-end cpu and 4gb of ram or less.

ATTENTION!!! Users with high-end systems will not notice any major performance increase compared to a regular windows copy.


OS VERSION: WINDOWS 7 SP1 X64 ENTERPRISE VL (6.1, BUILD 7601)

ACTIVATION: KMS

OS LANGUAGES: ENGLISH-GREEK(keyboard only)

UPDATES INTERGRATED: UNTILL 1ST MARCH 2016

ISO SIZE: 871MB(ESD)

INSTALLED OS SIZE: 4.0GB (without swap&hibernation)



INTERNET EXPLORER VERSION: 11.0.9600.18204

WINDOWS MEDIA PLAYER VERSION: 12.07601.18840

DOTNET FRAMEWORK VERSION: 4.6.1(3.5.1 is also featured&can be updated to 4.6.2 with offline installer)

DIRECTX VERSION: 11.1(via windows update platform)



COMPONENTS REMOVED: Accessibility,windows mail,windows phone,all languages except english-greek,protected storage

offline files,themes,samples,audio themes,application identity,application experience,applocker,NFS,EFS,

games,windows trusted installer,bitlocker,parental controls,error reporting,virtual disk,speech support & narrator,

easy transfer,scanner-fax-printer-display-webcam-sdcard-flashcard,modem drivers,ethernet,wireless,Help

windows update,windows background intelligent service,disk defragmenter,biometrics,internet Information Services

windows backup&restore,recovery,shadow volume,xps,windows update,event log,task scheduler,TFTP Client,natural language

windows firewall,windows defender,action center,mobility,assesment tool,telnet,fax,tablet PC,windows Journal

windows troubleshooting,welcome center,dvd play,dvd writer,wordpad,windows management service,MSMQ........


Fixes&Improvements over my original ISO:

1)OS size reduced approximately by 40%.
2)Better cleanup of services and MS crap.
3)The Runtime Errors (at - 1:0) with some game installations and game repacks are fixed and no longer occur.
4)Advanced sharing settings menu at network center now works properly.
4)The right-click-properties compatibility tab on apps is returned.
5)Hibernation is disabled by default.
6)8.3 NTFS names disabled by default.
7)Some fonts removed,including chinese and eastern.
8)AGP compatible.
9)Can play all legacy games(f.e max payne,vampires the masquerade,WWP)
10)Extra drivers removed: RAID,iSCSI,firewire,ISA,boot from network,fibre channel,pc card,tape drive,TV.
11)Removed indexing service,BITS,iSCSI service,windows disk cleaner.
12)Windows 7 x64 ISO can be installed with a 1GB usb flash drive whatever your potential(TESTED).

Known Issues:

1)To install the AMD crimson driver first install manually vcredist 2012&2013 or else u will get installation package error.
2)DotnetCache gets installed automatically while ur pc is idle for 10-15 minutes eating 50% of ur cpu,but it is temporary.
3)LAN and file sharing works only between a regular windows computer and a computer with my Lite version(in order to find lan server the server must be hosted on a normal windows machine),2 different computers with my lite version cannot share files or connect to a lan server with each other.

Installation:

Use rufus usb utility to make a bootable USB or directly burn it to a dvd.

Because this is a Lite Edition u will have to install ur own drivers for network,wi-fi and everything else.

All the files are original untouched from microsoft SEED&ENJOY!!!!!

Note: I won't be releasing any future windows 7 lite,because after february 2016 no new features will be added from microsoft,except some minor security updates
